sources.title: The Luck of the Irish (1948)
sources.description: Following American reporter Stephen Fitzgerald from Ireland to New York, a grateful leprechaun acts as the newsman's servant and conscience. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-luck-of-the-irish-1948/

metadata.Plot: Steven Fitzgerald, a newpaper reporter from New York, meets a leprechaun and a beautiful young woman while traveling in Ireland. When he returns to his fiance and her wealthy father's political campaign in New York, he finds that the leprechaun and the young woman are now in New York as well. Steven is torn between the wealth he might enjoy in New York or returning to his roots in Ireland.
metadata.Writer: Philip Dunne, Constance Jones, Guy Jones
metadata.Actors: Tyrone Power, Anne Baxter, Cecil Kellaway
